alert.note: Alert for Valley (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 26 at 4:05PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Valley County through 445 PM CDT... At 404 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northeast of Sargent, or 8 miles southwest of Burwell, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Fort Hartsuff State Park around 420 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Elyria and Ord. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
